oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: !nanni (XI)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: !nanni's grandfather Karu told him about Hu'-we, who is a !kun. 'Hu'-we' is what the !kun call a person who works many things, and the people also call him |xue. 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-11.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hu'-we (is |xue, and is a Bushman)
